```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(jsonlite)
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r loadjson, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
fromJSON("./all_atms_info.json") %>% 
     pluck("atms") %>% 
     reduce(bind_rows) %>% 
     select(lat, lng, wtm) %>%
     rename(popup = wtm) -> atm_df
     
```

ATM of Tsesnabank on the map, April 1, 2018
```{r showmap, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
atm_icon <- makeIcon(
     iconUrl = "./xxx046-128.png",
     iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
     iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16)

leaflet() %>%
     addTiles() %>%
     addMarkers(lat = atm_df$lat, 
                lng = atm_df$lng, 
                popup = atm_df$popup, 
                icon = atm_icon,
                clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
